name: Simon Game
description: A simple 'Simon say's game. It starts with you hitting the start button. Then wait until the first color appears. Click on the color that lights up and wait for the next round of colors. It's going to increment the rounds if you click on the correct colors. If you hit the 20 rounds without missing any colors you win the game. Technologies used: JS, HTML, CSS.
